metadata.title: High Capacity Battery for Motorola CP110 RDU2020 RDV2020 RDU4160D RDV5100 RDU208
features: Replaces battery model: Motorola RLN6305 RLN6305B RLN6308B RLN6306A RLN6351 RLN6351A RLN6351B RLN6351C RLN6351D
Compatible with Two Way Radios: CP110 RDU2020 RDU4100 RDM2070D RDU2080D RDU4160D RDV2020 RDV5100 EP150 XTNI-D A10 A12 CP1180 etc
Highest quality cells & components, guaranteed to meet or exceed the original equipment manufacturer's specifications.
Safety protection - Over-charge, over-discharge, over-heat, over-current & short-circuit protection
description: Voltage: 7.2V, Chemistry: Li-ION, Capacity: 2600MAH. Fits Replaces Motorola - Batteries: 6080384X65, RLN6351, RU2023BKF2AA, RU4103BKN9AA, RV2020BKF2AA, RV5103BKN9AA, RLN6305, RLN6351B, RU2080BKN8AA, RU4160BKN9AA, RV2080BKN8AA, RLN6308, RU2020BKF2AA, RU4100BKN9AA, RU4163BKN9AA, RV5100BKN9AA - Radios: CP110, CP1100, CP1180, CP110 RDX, EP150, RDM2070D, RDM2070BFAAS, RDU2020, RDU2023, RDU2080, RDU2080d, RDU4100, RDU4103, RDU4103d, RDU4160d, RDU4163d, RDV2020, RDV2080, RDV2080d, RDV5100, RDV5103, RDX, RDX2080, XTNI, XTNID. Highest Quality Cells & Components. Guaranteed to meet or exceed the original equipment manufacturer's specifications. Provides excellent discharge characteristics. High impact ABS and Polycarbonate plastic polymers for ruggedness. Comprehensive testing including high altitude performance, vibration, mechanical shock, thermal cycling, external short circuit, and overcharge test simulations .Guaranteed to maintain 80% of its rated capacity for 18 Months from date of shipment.
